verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he had \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w seventh|strong="G1442"\w* \w seal|strong="G4973"\w*, there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w silence|strong="G4602"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* the space of half an \w hour|strong="G2256"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* were \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w trumpets|strong="G4536"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* the \w altar|strong="G2379"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* a \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w censer|strong="G3031"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w incense|strong="G2368"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he should \w offer|strong="G1325"\w* \add it\add* with the \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w altar|strong="G2379"\w* which \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* of the \w incense|strong="G2368"\w*, \add which came\add* with the \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, ascended \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of the \w angelâ€™s|strong="G0032"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* the \w censer|strong="G3031"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w filled|strong="G1072"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* with \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w altar|strong="G2379"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \add it\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thunderings|strong="G1027"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lightnings|strong="G0796"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* an \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w trumpets|strong="G4536"\w* \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w sound|strong="G4537"\w*.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w sounded|strong="G4537"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w followed|strong="G1096"\w* \w hail|strong="G5464"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w mingled|strong="G3396"\w* with \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of \w trees|strong="G1186"\w* was burnt \w up|strong="G2618"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w green|strong="G5515"\w* \w grass|strong="G5528"\w* was burnt \w up|strong="G2618"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w sounded|strong="G4537"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* \w burning|strong="G2545"\w* with \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* was \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of the \w creatures|strong="G2938"\w* which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, and \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w life|strong="G5590"\w*, \w died|strong="G0599"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of the \w ships|strong="G4143"\w* were \w destroyed|strong="G1311"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w sounded|strong="G4537"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w star|strong="G0792"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w burning|strong="G2545"\w* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* a \w lamp|strong="G2985"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of the \w rivers|strong="G4215"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w fountains|strong="G4077"\w* of \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w star|strong="G0792"\w* is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Wormwood|strong="G0894"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* part of the \w waters|strong="G0894"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w wormwood|strong="G4183"\w*; \w and|strong="G0444"\w* \w many|strong="G0599"\w* \w men|strong="G1537"\w* \w died|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G5204"\w* the waters, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* they were made \w bitter|strong="G4087"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fourth|strong="G5067"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w sounded|strong="G4537"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* was \w smitten|strong="G4141"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of the \w moon|strong="G4582"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of the \w stars|strong="G0792"\w*; so \w as|strong="G2443"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* was \w darkened|strong="G4654"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w shone|strong="G5316"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* for a third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w likewise|strong="G3668"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w beheld|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w an|strong="G1520"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w flying|strong="G4072"\w* through the midst of \w heaven|strong="G3321"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w Woe|strong="G3759"\w*, \w woe|strong="G3759"\w*, \w woe|strong="G3759"\w*, to \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w inhabiters|strong="G2730"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* by \w reason|strong="G1537"\w* of the \w other|strong="G3062"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="G4536"\w* of the \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, which are \w yet|strong="G3195"\w* to \w sound|strong="G4537"\w*!
